features: READY TO GO: Each mask in this box is individually sealed so they are perfect to throw in your purse, backpack, gym bag, or even stash in your pocket! Perfect for dispensers, offices, schools and reception areas.

LIGHT & BREATHABLE: Designed for the utmost in comfort, these individual masks are painless and adjustable. They offer full coverage of the nose and mouth and are comfortable for extended wear, including air travel.

3 PROTECTIVE LAYERS: The innermost layer is super soft and gentle on the skin, and the outer leak-proof layer covers the high density filter. Made with non-woven materials, these paper masks are latex free.
EFFECTIVE FILTRATION: The glass free filter is effective at filtering many types of particles. Perfect for everyday wear. An adjustable wire runs along the top to serve as an adjustable nose clip.

MULTI USE COLORED MASKS: Designed for non medical use, these disposable masks come in all kinds of colors and in both kids and adult sizes. Also available are black, blue, pink, tie dye, navy, red, peach, plaid and other colors!
body.description: WeCare’s 3 Ply Face Masks are as comfortable as a face mask gets! Each mask is individually wrapped and sealed, so you can carry them around in your bag, purse or even pocket while maintaining hygiene and cleanliness.These masks are designed to be pain free and comfortable. The fabric is soft and gentle on your skin.Details- 3 Ply Protection- Individually Wrapped- Disposable- Elastic Ear Loops- Latex Free- Painless- Comfortable and Adjustable- Wire style Nose Clip- Box of 50- Available in Blue, Black, Pink, Tie Dye, Camo, Navy, Red, White, and Grey- Also Available in Kids Size

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I used these daily for a year working in a medical office, and I have nothing but good things to say about them. They are a good size, durable, soft, and the colors are gorgeous. (I got SO many compliments on the colors!) I especially love the fact that they’re individually wrapped, so I can easily keep a few in my purse / car / etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Colors and Comfort
reviews.reviewText: Love the colors. Very comfortable and easy to breathe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent - and as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I've been buying the light blue WeCare face masks since last June, and found them as advertised - individually wrapped, inside a box that is also wrapped. One point: the box is not quite as pictured here on Amazon. It only says "individually wrapped" on the lid, and nowhere else. I nearly returned my first box unopened, because it didn't state "individually wrapped" on the front, sides, or back. I didn't look at the lid! But luckily I happened to notice the print on the lid before I took action; on unwrapping and opening the box, I found that indeed the masks are individually wrapped.I've been using the WeCare brand of masks now for eight months. They have performed very well, and not once have I had an ear-band break or separate from the mask. I branched out to this butterfly design just a month ago, and everything I said above about the light blue masks applies to this design as well. I did notice a *very* faint scent when I put the first butterfly design mask on my face. But is was so faint, and dissipated so quickly, that maybe I just imagined it - because I was concerned about possible odor from the dye when I decided to buy them.So, all thumbs up. It's a pretty design, and the material is as soft and breathable as the light blue "standard" WeCare masks. The only negative is that the price for the butterfly design has increased 25% ($5.00) since I bought mine a month ago. I can only hope it goes back down before I need to buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My go-to brand for disposable face masks.
reviews.reviewText: I just ordered a second set of WeCare brand disposable face masks. The first set I ordered was the butterfly design. These masks fit well, don't have an odor, don't itch and have an adjustable wire across the nose which is important to me because I wear glasses. The second set is the spring design. I like the fact that they are individually wrapped. I work in a hospital and these masks provide the coverage I need and the thickness for safety. I have given several of the butterfly masks to coworkers who like them as much I as I do. I will say these masks run a bit larger across the face than other brands I have bought, but I have an oval/round face. This suits me because my ears don't pull forward like with other masks. However, my coworkers who have smaller faces adjusted the elastic part with a knot for a tighter fit and are pleased with the overall appearance and quality of the masks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good enough, but could be better
reviews.reviewText: This box of masks is not as good as the previous box I bought from the same brand. The purpose of buying my own disposable masks was because the ones at my workplace were low quality with loose fibers on the inner mask surface which drove me crazy. From this box I've used less than twenty and at least five of those had annoying fibers. The ear loops also feel a bit tighter and bother my ears faster.The colors are nice and I enjoy coordinating to my outfits. The nose piece is comfortable and adjustable. The ear loops are soft.I took one star off because the quality of this box was inferior to my prior box from the same company. (Same everything as before except my choice of color)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I work as a nurse so I’m required to wear masks more often than most. These masks are not only fun, but the most comfortable ones I’ve found! They are soft against my face but don’t shed in my mouth. I’ve ordered several times and will continue to use these. It’s an added plus that they are individually wrapped so I can toss them in my bag, glove compartment, and pretty much anywhere without them getting dirty or ruined. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Get a lot of positive comments at workMakes my patients smile !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good product. I like the fact that it is individually wrapped.
